mapper.insert: insert into buy(isbn, email, cDate, count, price, total, username, uid, name) values (#{ isbn }, #{ email }, #{ cDate }, #{ count }, #{ price }, #{ total }, #{ username }, #{ uid }, #{ name })
mapper.select:
select b1.*, b2.name, b2.credit, p.username, p.phone, u.uid from buy b1, book b2, person p, user u
b1.email = p.email and b1.isbn = b2.isbn and b1.email = u.email
and p.username like concat('%', #{ username }, '%')
and b1.isbn like concat('%', #{ isbn }, '%')
and b2.name like concat('%', #{ name }, '%')
order by cDate desc
